Hydro-Berkeley 1.0.0 documentation
previous | next | modules | index

Main Program¶

berkeley_hydro_main module¶

berkeley_hydro_main.main(params_file=None, data_file=None)[source]¶

As the name suggests, this is the main function that is called to initiate the simulation run.

Parameters

  • params_file – (string) that points to the input file for the parameters.

  • data_file – (string) that points to the input file for the water data.

Returns

None.

berkeley_hydro_main.validateInputParametersFile(filename)[source]¶

Validates an input (json) file to check if it contains the required keys. It does not validate the values of the keys.

Parameters

filename – Is a “Path” object that contains the input model parameters

for the simulation.

Returns

A dictionary loaded from the input file.

Raises

ValueError – if a keyword is missing from the file.
